traction.notes: The company is asking for $1.2M in funding.
The company has made its first hire.
The company is currently collecting sign-ups via a waitlist.

market.name: XR Commerce
market.notes: Positioned in the immersive reality commerce market.

product.name: Unified XR Commerce Studio
product.description: An AI-powered studio for businesses to create, manage, and deploy immersive 3D and XR experiences across web, mobile, and headsets.
features: VersaAI for 3D asset generation from text or images
Smart Try-On for apparel and accessories
AI Product Scanner (2D to 3D in under 30 seconds)
differentiators: Web-based with no app downloads required

legal.notes: The company has been granted a patent.
